titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir Levvis Dyve: to the Lord Marquis of New-Castle giveing his Lordship an account of the whole conduct of the Kings affaires in Irland [sic], since the time of the Lord Marquis of Ormond, His Excellencies arrival there out of France in Septem. 1648. Until Sr. Lewis his departure out of that Kingdome, in June 1650. Together with the annexed coppies of sundry letters mentioned by Sr. Lewis Dyve as relating to the businesse he treats of from the Hauge 10. 20. July 1650.
titleStmt.author: Dyve, Lewis, Sir, 1599-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuell Broun, English Bookseller,

notesStmt.note: 'The copies of the severall letters' has its own caption title, pagination, and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
